item.title: Need Team on RuneX
item.dc:creator: @CJShort CJShort
item.description:
@CJShort wrote:

[center][size=10pt]

Hello,

Im Mod Callum of RuneX-Gaming, Ill tell you more about the server here.

Current Staff Positons.

Lead Content Developer - Mod Short :: Owner
Content Developer & Advertiser - Mod Quadro (Artem543) :: Owner
Lead Website Developer - Mod Callum (Me) :: N/A
Lead Graphics Artist - Sneaky :: Forum Mod
JavaScript Coder + Basic Php - Bunyip :: In-Game Mod

Personally i feel that there should be less staff, Because i prefer it that way. When i look at the staff list here though, I think its a reasonable size.

The server is PI based, Very stable and major bugs have/will been fixed before release.

Although i cant say much information on the Game itself, I can tell you alot on the website.

It is runescape style, Has hiscores built in, Has a easy to use and fully working admin panel, Has full forums with Sticky and lock, Has a .com domain, Has a signature feature allowing in-game members to simpley type there username into the signature box and this will create a signature automatically with the users in-game levels, Has some other stuff but i cant be botherd to write it all.

Soon we are buying a advertisment which is confirmed to get 20,000 impressions, Im hopeing this will boost the server and give it a clean start with a bright future.

If you prefer to contact me, Add modcallum@hotmail.com on msn.

Thankyou,

Callum.[/size][/center]

Read full topic
